org.academiadecodigo.hackaton.pang.sprites

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • org.academiadecodigo.hackaton.pang.sprites.Player

  • public class Player
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
    Created by codecadet on 07/07/16. Class responsible to give shape, texture for the Players The Player has states: STANDING, RUNNING, SHOOTING Generates the animation for the Player Update the Position
